education.area: Interdisciplinary Philosophy & Science; Minors in Mathematics & Computer Science

work.name: Daedalus, Inc.
highlights: Pioneered novel integrated stereo depth perception & object detection algorithm by implementing and adapting academic research paper with no available source code, including custom optimizations for real-time performance on NVIDIA Jetson platform
Managed technical oversight of medical device firmware development for surgical systems, conducting code reviews and executing rigorous unit testing protocols for FDA-regulated software
Led software standup meeting and organize biweekly Learn & Share sessions for software team

work.name: Meta Platforms, Inc.
highlights: Deployed and optimized low-latency ML models for EMG/IMU signal processing in wearable non-invasive brain-computer interfaces as part of Augmented Reality division
Architected cross-platform signal processing library for multiple MCU/DSP targets using Python & C++

work.name: Facebook, Inc.
highlights: Built cross-platform mobile UI components for Facebook Marketplace, designed for accessibility

work.name: Chan Zuckerberg Initiative
highlights: Built proof of concept for differential data privacy system in Python to protect sensitive user data
